title: Netflix Issues Cautious Forecast Amid WBD Saga
description: John Belton of Gabelli Funds reacts to Netflix's fourth-quarter earnings on "Bloomberg The Close." He says the top-line numbers look generally healthy, but margin guidance is disappointing. The streaming leader says it plans to increase spending on films and TV shows by 10% in 2026 while forging ahead with plans to buy the studio and streaming business of Warner Bros. Discovery. (Source: Bloomberg)
